description:
Automate or integrate your Asana app with Bubble

Authorixation to connect Asana with your Bubble app.
. 
You can create your own custom calls or request ones by joining the community and expanding this plugin with new API calls, Elements & Actions.
instructions:
1. In Asana, go to profile settings apps, manage developer apps and add new application

2. Please insert the call back url in your Asana developer app as per your bubble app url that will be triggering the workflow

3. Insert App ID/Client ID as per your asana developer app instructions

4. Insert App secret/Client Secret as per your asana developer app instructions
name: Asana
plugin_instructions:
To receive App ID & App Secret

Please go to Asana Profile/Image Icon.
Click on My Profile Settings
Click on Apps
Click on manage Developer Apps

Create new apps 
Follow the instructions to get an 
App ID:
App Secret: 

Insert App ID & App Secret in Asana Plugin in Bubble

Enjoy!
